verses.verse: <S%G5043>Sons<s%>, <S%G5219>obey<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G1118>parents<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1342>right<s%>.

<S%G5091>Honor<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3384>mother<s%>; <S%G3748>(which<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G1785>commandment<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G1860>promise<s%>;)
<S%G2443>That<s%> it may <S%G1096>be<s%> <S%G2095>well<s%> with <S%G4671>you<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> you <S%G2071>may<s%> live <S%G3118>long<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%>, <S%G3588>you<s%> <S%G3962>fathers<s%>, <S%G3949>provoke<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5043>sons<s%> to <S%G3949>wrath<s%>: <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1625>bring<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1625>up<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3809>nurture<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3559>admonition<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>.

<S%G1401>Servants<s%>, be obedient <S%G5219>to<s%> them that <S%G3588>are<s%> your <S%G2962>masters<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>, <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5401>fear<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5156>trembling<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G572>singleness<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> unto <S%G5547>Christ<s%>;

<S%G3361>Not<s%> <S%G2596>with<s%> <S%G3787>eyeservice<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G441>menpleasers<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G1401>servants<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G4160>doing<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G5590>heart<s%>;
<S%G3326>With<s%> good <S%G2133>will<s%> doing <S%G1398>service<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> to the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> to <S%G444>men<s%>:

<S%G1492>Knowing<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1437%G99999>whatever<s%> good <S%G18%G99999>thing<s%> any <S%G1538>man<s%> <S%G4160>does<s%>, the <S%G5124>same<s%> shall he <S%G2865>receive<s%> <S%G3844>of<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G1535>whether<s%> he be <S%G1401>bond<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G1658>free<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%>, <S%G4160>you<s%> <S%G2962>masters<s%>, <S%G4160>do<s%> the same <S%G846>things<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G447>desist<s%> from <S%G547>threatening<s%>: <S%G1492>knowing<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G5216%G99999>your<s%> <S%G2962>Master<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2532>heaven<s%>; <S%G3756>neither<s%> is <S%G2076>there<s%> respect of <S%G4382>persons<s%> <S%G3844>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G3063>Finally<s%>, <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G80>brothers<s%>, be <S%G1743>strong<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2904>power<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2479>might<s%>.

Put <S%G1746>on<s%> the whole <S%G3833>armor<s%> of <S%G4314>God<s%>, <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> may be <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G2476>stand<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> the <S%G3180>wiles<s%> of the <S%G1228>devil<s%>.

<S%G3754>For<s%> <S%G2254>we<s%> <S%G3823>wrestle<s%> <S%G3756%G99999>not<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> <S%G746>principalities<s%>, <S%G4314>against<s%> <S%G1849>powers<s%>, <S%G4314>against<s%> the <S%G2888>rulers<s%> of the <S%G4655>darkness<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G165>world<s%>, <S%G4314>against<s%> <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> <S%G4189>wickedness<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> high <S%G2032>places<s%>.

<S%G1223%G99999>Therefore<s%> take unto <S%G353>you<s%> the whole <S%G3833>armor<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> you may be <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G436>withstand<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> having <S%G2716>done<s%> <S%G537>all<s%>, to <S%G2476>stand<s%>.

<S%G2476>Stand<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%>, <S%G4024>having<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3751>waist<s%> <S%G4024>belted<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G225>truth<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> having <S%G1746>on<s%> the <S%G2382>breastplate<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness<s%>;
<S%G2532>And<s%> your <S%G4228>feet<s%> <S%G5265>shod<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> the <S%G2091>preparation<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G1515>peace<s%>;

<S%G1909>Above<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%>, <S%G353>taking<s%> the <S%G2375>shield<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%>, with <S%G1722%G99999>which<s%> you shall be <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G4570>quench<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4448>fiery<s%> <S%G956>darts<s%> of the <S%G4190>wicked<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G1209>take<s%> the <S%G4030>helmet<s%> of <S%G4992>salvation<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3162>sword<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G4487>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>:

<S%G4336>Praying<s%> <S%G1722%G99999%G99999>always<s%> <S%G1223>with<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4335>prayer<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1162>supplication<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G69>watching<s%> <S%G1519%G99999%G99999>there<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4343>perseverance<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1162>supplication<s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G40>saints<s%>;

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G3056>utterance<s%> may be <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G1722>unto<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%>, that I may <S%G457>open<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4750%G99999>mouth<s%> <S%G3954>boldly<s%>, to make <S%G1107>known<s%> the <S%G3466>mystery<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel<s%>,

<S%G5228>For<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I am an <S%G4243>ambassador<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G254>bonds<s%>: <S%G2443>that<s%> in <S%G1722%G99999>it<s%> I may speak <S%G3955>boldly<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G3165>I<s%> <S%G1163>ought<s%> to <S%G2980>speak<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> may <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G1691>my<s%> <S%G2596>affairs<s%>, and <S%G5101>how<s%> I <S%G4238>do<s%>, <S%G5190>Tychicus<s%>, a <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G1249>minister<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, shall make <S%G1107>known<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%>:

<S%G3739>Whom<s%> I have <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1519%G99999>for<s%> that <S%G5124>purpose<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> you might <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G4012>affairs<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> that he might <S%G3870>comfort<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%>.

<S%G1515>Peace<s%> be to the <S%G80>brothers<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>, <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

<S%G5485>Grace<s%> be <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> them <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G861>sincerity<s%>. Amen. Written from Rome to the Ephesians by Tychicus.
